LanguageData.VFEM_PlagueMask.label: plague mask
LanguageData.VFEM_PlagueMask.description: Plague mask prevents the wearer from catching plague.
LanguageData.VFEM_AntisepticSmell.label: antiseptic smell
LanguageData.VFEM_AntisepticSmell.description: Essential oils of healroot absorbed into the blood. Causes weakness and confusion.
